titleStmt.title: Eternity, or, The weightiness of the unseen concerns of the other world, from their duration opened, proved, and applyed in a sermon preached in Worcestershire / by Tho. Badland ...
titleStmt.author: Badland, Tho. (Thomas)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Sampson Evans, book-seller in Worcester, and are to be sold by N. Simmons ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
